column3: â€œbeing someone who suffers from chronic pain and PTSD I have found eating some of a  froot loops bar, I do get some decent pain control as well as being able to get some sleep. I'm just now starting w/ edibles & I have to say I am more than pleasantly surprised. I did find myself quite chatty with my physical therapist today so I can vouch for what I read in the effects description. But the best thing is being able to...â€

â€œFRUIT LOOPS!!!! Okay, let me just begin by saying that fruit loops are one of the nicest looking strains out there - Blue, Purple, Red, Silver trichomes  coating the entire nug. In terms of it's 'medicinal' value, very very uplifting strain for being an indica, good day time relaxation that's not gonna make you fall asleep, also very good at helping with anxiety and appetite loss. I'd say this is like the xanax of ma...â€

â€œThis is one of the best smelling and tasting strains I've ever tried ğŸ˜ no complaints with this beauty. a very good strong high that will leave you satisfied! Glad I got to try this while it was available very recommended!â€
â€œI really liked this strain. No anxiety or paranoia. Good for daytime. Tastes and smells great.â€

â€œWow, I can totally dig these Fruity loops. Mild Indica even when rolled into a 1 gram hash-stick. Amazing aromatics, not very sedating, has a great Sativa mind twist that promotes happiness. Plus a cool name that matches her lovely smell.â€

â€œThe stuff I had from Nectar was unlike any other bud I've seen... I kid you not from an 1/8th I gathered nearly a full gram of kief! This stuff is like white powder. Hands down my favorite strain this far.â€
â€œbomb afâ€

â€œWas really looking forward to this strain, as I'm a fan of it's parent strains (Blue Dream, Grapefruit, Blueberry, White Widow).  My batch was a little harsh, but sweet on the exhale.  I was, however, a little let down by this strain.  Don't get me wrong, it provides a cerebral buzz with a mellow body high, but for me, it was just 'meh'.â€
â€œDefinitely a relaxing, happy strain. Perfect to mellow outâ€
â€œLiked this strain, harsh on the throat for me though. Smelled good.â€
â€œTastes very sweet coming out and feels very smooth going in! Love this strain, the smell is amazing and the high is amazing, would definitely recommend!â€

â€œTonite I'm smoking on Fruit Loops, and indica dominant hybrid, that true to its name tastes like Froot Loops cereal - a sort of dull yet tasty fruit taste but that's what happens when they get dunked in milk, right?

Mine tested at 19.30% THC and .02 % CBD. I'm definitely feeling  heaviness in my head and  a nice couch lock coming on, making this a very nice bedtime strain.  There's a cerebral quality to this one too...â€

â€œThis strain is almost like Girl Scout Cookie! Nice mellow body high that reaches up to your temples! Grab a 1/4 of this, go to your favorite fast food, go home, turn on a dope ass movie and Boom.......nothing else matters!!! Cheers!â€
â€œbest high no negatives and taste and smell is goodâ€
â€œSuper relaxed head high. Smells and smokes amazingâ€

â€œGood looking and tasting.  Solid all around fix... may need a bit more than normal to feel the effects, then you realize it takes effect slower due to it's balance and now you are really baked.  Very even balance of flowery goodness.â€

â€œGood looking and tasting.  Solid all around fix... may need a bit more than normal to feel the effects, then you realize it takes effect slower due to it's balance and now you are really baked.  Very even balance of flowery goodness.â€
â€œSuper relaxed head high. Smells and smokes amazingâ€
â€œvery relaxing, happy uplifted high. low energy but it's nice and comfortable. high on it as writing this, everything is happiness.â€

â€œFruit loop budder in a vape: 

Smoke was a bit harsh in the throat but the high was fairly good. Clear and focused on the onset, settling into happy, mildly euphoric, calm. Leaves you relaxed, but not lazy.â€

â€œi give this strain 5 stars mainly because of its aroma of actual fruits ans berries permiates throughout. However the smoke was a bit harsh and they indica effects were a 5 outta 10 for my personal taste. Huge dense nugs of bright green with amber hairs slight hints of Purple. Def an itch that has now been scratched, another one checked off the to-do list ğŸ˜‰â€

â€œif you love blue dream then you'll love this strain. I work in the marijuana Industry in Washington state and I received this as a sample in flower form from a company called Growing Like a Weed who list their phenotype as sativa (which doesnt make sense because it is Indica) but either way it reminded if a Indica version blue dream, I think would be if the Haze parent in blue dream didnt shine through as strong I fe...â€

â€œI really enjoy this balanced, well slightly dominant indica, strain. I find it to be a medium smoke with a nice sweet/berry taste, I can see where the name comes from. I get a nice euphoric head high, followed by a mellow sensation that keeps me talking more than normal. This is great for morning/day use.â€
â€œreal nice fruity taste and smell. strong enough. give it a try.â€
â€œAmazing bud !!â€
â€œGood quality cannabisâ€
â€œLooked good, potentcy tested 28%, didn't taste like fruit loops much, maybe slightly fruity on exhale, but good solid buzz and body effect. Pretty good overall strain.â€
â€œSUPER DANK! Royal Budline in Sun Valley had a special..so glad I got it!! Tastes like fruit when you hit it!! Hoot!!!!â€

â€œGood Quality Bud.â€

â€œSmells amazing, mango and other tropical fruits dominate, hints of citrus and skunk as well. Taste is pleasant. The high is uplifting but mellow, not the strongest bud but still good for an afternoon or early evening smoke session, especially before dinner!â€

â€œOne of my favourite strains.  Very relaxing and great for sparking creativity.  Smells great, not very sticky or dank. Wonâ€™t knock you out either.  Great for a lazy afternoon.   Hope I can get this again soon.â€

Love it.â€
